document_data.name: Scrivener's Harbor
document_data.location: [[Five Temples Square]], [[Myth Nantar/Trade Quarter|Trade Quarter]], [[Myth Nantar]], [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Scrivener's Harbor''' was a temple dedicated to [[Oghma]] beneath the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]], in the undersea city of [[Myth Nantar]].
document_data.Location: This temple was located on [[Five Temples Square]], in the [[Myth Nantar/Trade Quarter|Trade Quarter]] of Myth Nantar.
document_data.History:
Scrivener's Harbor, much like the four other temples of Five Temples Square, was founded in Myth Nantar by immigrant races.

Around the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, six [[priest]]s of this temple were allowed by the [[Dukar]]s to work and study in Myth Nantar's [[Great Library (Myth Nantar)|Great Library]] in return for having their collections of writing merged.
